summary: In this final comprehensive COVID-19 report, we provided updates to our work regarding the impact of the pandemic on public health, the economy, and federal spending. Our work on the COVID-19 pandemic has produced over 200 reports and 484 recommendations to the Congress and federal agencies. More than half of the recommendations have been implemented. This body of work has yielded at least $43.9 billion...
title: COVID-19: Update on Key Indicators, the Federal Response, and Implementation of GAO Recommendations
